patthana10.10:1.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.10:2.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.10:3.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana10.10:5.1: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā catuvīsa …pe… vipāke sattarasa …pe… avigate catuvīsa.
